篩.definition: (bound form) a sieve; to sieve; to sift; to filter; to eliminate through selection; to warm a pot of rice wine (over a fire or in hot water); to pour (wine or tea); (dialect) to strike (a gong)

篩糠.definition: to sift chaff; (fig.) to shake all over

篩除.definition: to screen or filter out; to winnow (agriculture)
